email.subject: Competition Injustice
email.body:
Hello there,
We don't know each other very well just yet, but I do know you got rejected from joining the Hacker Wars competition this year.
Perhaps you wanted a challenge? Was looking to prove yourself? Or perhaps you're more of the show-off type?
Whatever your reasons, I think I can help you.
That's right, let's HACK you a place into Hacker Wars #PLAYERNAME#! Kind of ironic, don't you think?
Before we get started, I wonder if your toolsets and skills are up-to-date?
Why don't you show me what you've got and grab yourself some tools on my server? I've attached a link below.
> Note: This mission is fully skippable, simply reply "done" to the email.
